# Interface IntentNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface

Represents the properties for the intent node execution config.

interface IntentNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface {  
matcherConfig: [IntentMatcherCreationConfigInterface](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher_creation_config.IntentMatcherCreationConfigInterface);  
reportToClient?: boolean;  
}
